title: Labyrinths
medium:
Medium: 100% polyester
Technique: woven with heat-cut edges (the mill's term for the structure is damask, but actually consists of a black ground warp and two pattern weft colors, both in satin)
description: A row of eleven labyrinths woven to be reversible in orange and green/grey.
name: Ribbon and sample
